data.text: @umanduhhh This is so awful. They should all be locked up forever, or just shot.

@Anapurnah @Purple_Llamas_ Oh but it's well over a million, and just like the OP posted, there are a lot of people who did not report their adverse events. With 300 million people in America and the 1 million reports through VAERS, statistically speaking one and every 300 people has a VAERS report
@Purple_Llamas_ @umanduhhh It doesn't matter if it's less than a million, right? 🤦‍♂️ https://t.co/GMTVeB0yVV
@umanduhhh Yes and it's so weird that there haven't been millions upon millions of these things being reported in the last year 🤦‍♂️
@umanduhhh That’s not how medical disclosure works. You think you found this massive “gotcha” document. You’re stupid.
There are multiple pages like this outlining just about any medical condition you could think of- mostly bad ones.
